ingredients: +   3/4 cup white sugar,   +   1/4 cup light olive oil, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract,   +   1/2 teaspoon almond extract, 2 large eggs, 1   +   3/4 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder,   +   1/4 teaspoon salt, 1   +   1/2 cups pistachio nuts,   +   1/2 cup dried cranberries
